limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.list-1: The teams are doubles (singles not supported yet)
limitations.list-2: The number of players must be even and needs to be incremented by 4 (because if you add odd numbers or not multiples of 4, some players will need to wait until a match ends at the round).
limitations.list-3: The process will be sent always to your devide, this can freeze the page.

player-name.label: Player name
player-name.placeholder: Fill with the name of the player...

list.title: Players
list.name: Name
list.empty: Please, create you first player to display here!

table.total-players: You have a total of {{ totalPlayers }} players
table.total-matches: The total of matches is {{ totalMatches }}
